inclusion.criterion: symptomatic disease with >50% stenosis by duplex
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: asymptomatic disease with >60% stenosis by duplex ultrasound
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Lack of radial pulse on either arm
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known Deep venous thrombosis (DVT) in arm
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Arteriovenous fistula or graft in both arms
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pre-existing lymphedema or axillary node dissection both arms
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of dementia, intellectual disability, or mental illness including depression, anxiety, or schizophrenia
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has significant bilateral carotid stenosis and is symptomatic with dizziness. He does not have any exclusion criteria that would make him ineligible for the trial.
